@v4free depending on your video card and your your cpu/s results may vary. You can open preferences and video output in VLC and set it to xvideo if you have a nvidia card, or gl (fast ATI) for ATI card.
Can anyone write out the differences between this 'extended' version and the regular version please..??

hi yify

i was wondering if you can do the rocky and rambo series...

@warri00r depeding on the runtime of the movie, the makers at times end up removing few scenes from the "Theatrical" release because ppl might feel it's long. When releasing in DVD, the makers will release an "Extended" cut which features all the scenes removed due to "long runtime". Hope it was useful. :)
